txb_file_type.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"FileType") and contains(@id,"DocuValue") and contains(@id,"DocuView") and  1]

txb_original_file_name.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"OriginalFileName") and contains(@id,"DocuValue") and contains(@id,"DocuView") and  1]

txb_file_ID.xpath: //input[contains(@aria-describedby,"helptext") and contains(@aria-describedby,"RdcDocStoreFileId") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuValue") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuView") and  1]

txb_file_location.xpath: //textarea[contains(@aria-describedby,"helptext") and contains(@aria-describedby,"Path") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuValue") and contains(@aria-describedby,"DocuView") and  1]
